# Image Gen

> AI-powered image generation CLI and Claude Code plugin with 10 provider support.

Image Gen unifies 10 AI image generation providers into a single interface. It provides intelligent provider selection, automatic fallbacks, and enterprise-grade reliability.

## What It Does

- Generates AI images using 10 different providers through one unified API
- Automatically selects the best provider based on the prompt content
- Falls back to alternative providers if one fails
- Works as a Claude Code plugin for seamless integration

## Supported Providers (10)

1. **OpenAI (DALL-E 3)**: General purpose, excellent text rendering
2. **BFL (FLUX.2)**: Photorealism, product shots, 4K resolution
3. **Stability AI (SDXL)**: Controlled generation, img2img support
4. **Ideogram (v3)**: Best typography, logos, text in images
5. **Google Gemini (Imagen 4)**: Multi-image composition, multimodal
6. **FAL**: Fast iterations, FLUX models, sub-second speed
7. **Leonardo**: Artistic renders, fantasy, characters, game assets
8. **Recraft (v3)**: #1 ELO ranked, vector output, perfect text
9. **Replicate**: Open source models, maximum flexibility
10. **ClipDrop**: Upscaling, background removal, post-processing

## Installation

For Claude Code users:

```
/plugin marketplace add shipdeckai/claude-skills
/plugin install image-gen@shipdeckai/claude-skills
```

## Configuration

Set API keys in your shell profile:

```bash
export OPENAI_API_KEY="sk-..."       # For DALL-E
export BFL_API_KEY="..."             # For FLUX (best quality)
export STABILITY_API_KEY="..."       # For Stable Diffusion
export IDEOGRAM_API_KEY="..."        # For typography
export GEMINI_API_KEY="..."          # For Google Imagen
```

## Usage Examples

```
> Generate a professional product photo of a coffee mug
> Create a logo for a tech startup called "Nexus"
> Generate a 4K landscape photograph of mountains at sunset
```

## Key Features

- **Intelligent Selection**: Routes to the best provider for each prompt
- **Automatic Fallbacks**: Never fails a generation
- **Type Safety**: Full TypeScript with Zod validation
- **Claude Code Native**: Built-in integration

- Website: https://shipdeckai.github.io/image-gen
- GitHub: https://github.com/shipdeckai/image-gen
- Plugin: https://github.com/shipdeckai/claude-skills
